articles.author: Hermes Auto
articles.title: WHO to reconvene monkeypox emergency committee after over 6000 cases reported - The Straits Times
articles.description:
Europe is the current epicentre of the outbreak, recording more than 80% of monkeypox cases globally.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: GENEVA (AFP) - The World Health Organisation (WHO) will reconvene its monkeypox experts to decide if the worsening outbreak now constitutes a global public health emergency, its chief said on Wednesd… [+1864 chars]

articles.author: Paul Withers
articles.title: Euro in FREEFALL: Currency loses 10% of value against dollar edging nearer parity disaster - Express
articles.description: THE EURO is in total freefall after losing more than 10 percent of its value against the US dollar in a plunge that is sure to send recession alarm bells ringing throughout the European Union.

articles.title: Earth orbit, Moon, Mars: ESA's ambitious roadmap - Phys.org
